summary: A comprehensive pytest suite that uses Moto to mock AWS RDS services and validates a wide range of RDS operations, including instance and cluster lifecycle management, parameter and option groups, global clusters, filtering logic, CloudFormation template generation, event subscriptions, export tasks, DB proxies and proxy target groups, server interactions, and supporting utility functions.
business_intent: Guarantee that the RDS management code behaves correctly against AWS APIs, supports infrastructure-as-code workflows, and prevents regressions across all RDS resource types and related features.
